uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.text

Interface LocalizedString

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CharSequence, Observable<String>, ObservableValue<String>

    public interface LocalizedString
extends ObservableValue<String>, CharSequence
    A localised string interface which is observable over the string data changes due to updated locale.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.ObservableValue
